reviewText: Dharmendra & Amitabh Bachchan are the best actor in the film. Dharmendra & Amitabh Bachchan are brothers in the film. I love this movie because it has a lot of action. Zeenat Aman is Dharmendra's girlfriend and Rekha is Amitabh Bachchan's girlfriend in the film. Ajit, Amjad Khan & Prem Chopra are the villains in the film. The film was shot in Goa, India.
